function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemic outbreak of Coronavirus","Impact":"High risk of contagion and spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict lockdown measures, work-from-home policy, and prohibition of access to public spaces","Technologies":"Remote work technology, data management systems","People":"General public, municipal employees, students","Owner":"Municipal Administration, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Nearly unoccupied municipal buildings, elementary schools, and nursery schools","Impact":"Increased risk of stagnant air, lack of ventilation, and potential for disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regular ventilation, air quality monitoring, and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air quality sensors, disinfection technology","People":"Municipal employees, students, visitors","Owner":"Municipal Administration, school administration"}]}
